colorblind.generators

Class ColorBlindnessSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • colorblind.generators.Generator
      • colorblind.generators.ColorTranformGenerator
        • colorblind.generators.ColorBlindnessSimulator

  • public class ColorBlindnessSimulator
extends ColorTranformGenerator
    Optimized implementation of a Daltonize algorithm. This works by precomputing a set of lookup tables for every possible color. The lookup tables will use 256 MB of RAM. Without these optimizations it would not be possible to use this algorithm in real time.
    Author:
    James Schmitz
